power_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the power sensor to integrate over time.

*See also: [Total Daily Energy Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/total_daily_energy.html#configuration-variables)*

restore.docs:
**boolean**: Whether to store the intermediate result on the device so that the value can be restored upon power cycle or reboot. Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [Total Daily Energy Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/total_daily_energy.html#configuration-variables)*

method.docs:
**string**: The method to use for calculating the total daily energy. One of `trapezoid`, `left` or `right`. Defaults to `right`.

*See also: [Total Daily Energy Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/total_daily_energy.html#configuration-variables)*
